p: Only two alcohols were identified in all cultivars, ( Z)-3-hexen-1-ol, which was present in all harvest periods of all cultivars, in contrast to octanol, which was present in smaller amounts and was not identified in all harvest periods for all four cultivars studied. ( Z)-3-hexen-1-ol showed an increase in all cultivars, except in cv. Lastovka, where there was a decrease in all harvest periods. In olive fruits, ( Z)-3-hexen-1-ol is one of the aroma compounds largely contributing to the first stage of ripeness as well as the over-ripe stage [ 38]. It is also well known green leaf volatile attributing to ‘green odor’ of leaves [ 39].
